name: FGJ23 - Attack of the Unrooters
description:
Attack of the Unrooters

Help Bellroot to defence it´s beloved flower pot from evil Unrooters. Collect seed packs to fill your ammos. Jump in your flower pot and be ready to shoot those rotten weeds. 

Let´s see how long you will survive!

- The Game was made in 48 hours for FGJ 2023 -
